title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the BASGRA Model
text: can install development version PEcAn.BASGRA r-universe like : can install directly GitHub remotes package like :
code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.BASGRA in R install.packages('PEcAn.BASGRA') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/basgra")

title: run BASGRA model — run_BASGRA
text: BASGRA wrapper function. Runs writes model outputs PEcAn standard.

title: run BASGRA model — run_BASGRA
code: run_BASGRA(   run_met,   run_params,   site_harvest,   site_fertilize,   start_date,   end_date,   outdir,   sitelat,   sitelon,   co2_file = NULL,   write_raw_output = FALSE )

title: run BASGRA model — run_BASGRA
text: run_met path CF met run_params parameter vector site_harvest path harvest file site_fertilize path fertilizer application file start_date start time simulation end_date end time simulation outdir write BASGRA output sitelat latitude site sitelon longitude site co2_file path daily atmospheric CO2 concentration file, optional, defaults 350 ppm missing write_raw_output write raw output csv

title: run BASGRA model — run_BASGRA
text: BASGRA written fortran run R wrapper functions written Marcel Van Oijen. function makes use wrappers gives control datastream model PEcAn. function skip model2netcdf, can also skip met2model keeping now. write.config.BASGRA modifies args function template.job job.sh runs calls function run model

title: run BASGRA model — run_BASGRA
text: Istem Fer, Julius Vira

title: write_restart.BASGRA — write_restart.BASGRA
text: outdir outout directory runid run id start.time Time current assimilation step stop.time Time next assimilation step settings pecan settings list new.state Analysis state matrix returned sda.enkf RENAME flag either rename output file new.params optional, additionals params pass write.configs deterministically related parameters updated analysis inputs new input paths updated SDA workflow, passed write.configs
